name: Dependencies required for SwagGo Enhanced Chat System
description: Add these dependencies to your package.json

installation_commands.frontend: npm install dayjs socket.io-client web-push framer-motion lucide-react @headlessui/react react-hot-toast uuid workbox-precaching workbox-routing workbox-strategies
installation_commands.backend: npm install socket.io web-push dayjs uuid mongoose multer helmet compression express-rate-limit
